title: Computational Cellular Neurobiology
description: Biophysical models of neurons and small neural circuits, including ion channels, synapses, dendrites, and neuromodulators. Analysis of neurons as nonlinear dynamical systems. Enrollment restricted to MS students only in the following major code: BI84, BI87. This course and BGGN 252 are taught in alternate years. May be coscheduled with BIPN 146.
